name: 100 Years of the Kyiv Polytechnical Institute
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to 100th anniversary of Kyiv Polytechnic Institute, today the National Technical University of Ukraine
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is a depiction of the small National Emblem of Ukraine in the center of a ornament interpreting the interior decorated the ceiling of the main institute building. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: УКРАЇНА, 2 ГРИВНІ, 1998 (Ukraine, 2 Hryvnia, 1998)
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a depiction of the main institute building (architect I.S.Kitner, 1901). Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: КИЇВСЬКИЙ ПОЛІТЕХНІЧНИЙ ІНСТИТУТ, 100 РОКІВ (Kyiv Polytechnical Institute, 100 years)
